data.message:
Guys Respect EMINEM

Don't hate em.

Cause he is stronger than he was. 

He struggles till he collapses.

He's never been afraid.

He lost himself. 

He's friend with a monster under his bed.

Don't mourn when he is gone.

He loves the way you lie.

He's going to buy you a mocking bird.

He thinks you are beautiful.

Stan died.

He's the real slim shady.

He made us fall down like toy soldiers.

He said "you wouldn't like rap without me"

He's space bound.

He's a role model. 

He's phenomenal.

He's cleaning out his closest tonight.

At 3:00 am he's talking to himself.

He went berzerk.

He needs a doctor. 

He's a survivalist.

He told us his name.

He can't be your superman.

That's why he is beginning to feel like a rap god.

He's like that king that never dies.

And he eats mom's spaghetti for all three meals a day.

And he is whatever you say he is,if he wasn't then why would you say he is.

And we all are waiting for your new album so will you please sing for the moment.

If you don't show respect he's gonna kill you OR He'll just don't give a fuck. 

(Edited )

replies.message:
He also is asking for trouble when he starts  political bs, childish drama ok.  I have always liked his music. The new single, walk on water SUCKED, HARDCORE!  

People who have purchased his shit and see him acting a fool have a right to be pissed at him he doesn't give a fk so why should we. He's still a rich loser.
